body: Special thanks to all those staff members that worked all day today on the overload of staff applications (And for the next couple of weeks)! This takes time and effort to read them all and decide whether to accept or not. Hope you all appreciate their them making this possible for us as much as I do!

title: Special Thanks!

replies.body: Yes! Thank you for not making us wait 3 stressful weeks for a response! <3
